item.title: About the fine hearing of the porcupine
item.summary: Habits of the Bat and the Porcupine, etc. By Día!kwãin, from his parents (L V.-6. 4378-4403). About the fine hearing of the porcupine and how the people hunting it must not make a noise or it will hear them.
item.comments: 1) This story is a note that explains line 3, p.4402 of A Bushman belief about the bat and the porcupine, 2) This story is found in Book V-6
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)

keyword.subkw: the fine hearing of the porcupine
the fine hearing of the porcupine and hunting it
